name: Cyber Race
description:
Players enter an early cyber-style city and start racing. The game is rated gold, silver and bronze for completion at different times. Along the way, there will be a lot of early cyber artwork hanging along the lanes.

Hint: Cross the checkpoint one by one to win

Victory：2 laps

Movement: WASD

Ruiqi Gao: Asset Designer

Changyuan Huang: Programmer & Music and sound effects Director/Composer

Yunxin Feng / Zhihao Chen: UI/UX Designer

Art Work reference: 

https://www.are.na/evan-collins-1522646491/early-cyber
